alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:44AM CDT until August 09 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN COMANCHE...NORTHEASTERN JACKSON...KIOWA AND NORTHEASTERN GREER COUNTIES... At 1243 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rocky to near Roosevelt to 4 miles northeast of Headrick, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hobart, Granite, Blair, Mountain View, Lone Wolf, Roosevelt, Gotebo, Cooperton, Warren, Tom Steed Reservoir, northwestern Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge, and Altus-Lugert Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
